ygData.subject: Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Fracturcon suddenly notices Sniper s Maximal insignia & powers down his gun, but at the same time opens his missile compartment to be on the safe side.

Fracturcon suddenly notices Sniper's Maximal insignia & powers down his gun=
, but at the same time opens his missile compartment to be on the safe side=
.
FRACTURCON: "A fellow Maximal, that's a relief.  I'm here to help the Max=
imals drive the Predicons out of here.  You're the first transformer I've e=
ncountered since arriving here.  I'm Fracturcon & have just arrived here to=
 do a survey of this planet.  I was unaware that there were any transformer=
s left on this planet.  Who are you looking for?"
